30040000.Original_Text: 이번에도 늦으셨습니다~ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>! 하하.\n간만에 돌아오신 걸 환영합니다!
30040000.English_Text:
You're late again this time~ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lord Moon</>! Haha.
Welcome back after a while!
30040000.Chinese_Text:
这次又迟到了~ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>文珠大人</>!哈哈. 
 过会儿欢迎回来!

30040004.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Red Don</> is handled by the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Guard Captain</>.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Go to Patrol Leader</>

30040005.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>홍돈칠</>만 믿고 있어도 괜찮을까?\n하, 그래도 지금은 그 방법 밖에...
30040005.English_Text:
Is it okay if I just trust <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</>?
Ha, but for now, that's the only way...
30040005.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>我只相信Hong Donchil</>可以吗? 
哈,不过现在只能这样了……

30040006.English_Text:
With <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> help you!
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Elder</> What do you think <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Cap</>?

30040007.Original_Text: 그래도 다 계획이 있으시겠지.\n우리는 두 분을 믿고 따르는 수 밖에.
30040007.English_Text:
You must have a plan, though.
We have no choice but to trust and follow the two of you.
30040007.Chinese_Text:
不过大家还是要有计划的.
我们只能相信你们两个,跟着你们走.

30040008.English_Text:
Where is the fate of our tribe...
I miss <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Suwol Plains</>...
30040008.Chinese_Text:
我们部落的命运何去何从……
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>我怀念水月平原</>……

30040009.Original_Text: 잘 부탁하셔~!\n우리 부족의 운명은 둘의 손에 달렸으셔!
30040009.English_Text:
Take care of me~!
The fate of our tribe is in our hands!
30040009.Chinese_Text:
请多多关照~!
我们部落的命运掌握在自己的手中!

30040012.English_Text:
The resistance of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> is stronger than I thought.
Is it time to consider reinforcements?
30040012.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>的抗性比我想象的要强 
是时候考虑增援了吗?

30040013.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>과 동행하는 저 소협은 누구지?\n뭔가 묘한 기운이 느껴지는데.
30040013.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Who is that small gang with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Munju</>?
I feel something strange.
30040013.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>陪伴月亮大师</>的那个小帮派是谁?
我觉得有些奇怪.

30040014.Original_Text: 깜짝놀랄만한 증원이라는게 대체 뭐지?\n어!? 저, 저분은??
30040014.English_Text:
What the hell is a surprise reinforcement?
Huh!? Me, that one??
30040014.Chinese_Text:
什么是突袭强化?
啊!?我,那个??

30040015.English_Text:
Ugh... it's a mistake.
Hey, are you okay?
30040015.Chinese_Text:
呃……搞错了. 
喂,你还好吗?

30040016.Original_Text: 내 걱정보다 자네 걱정이나해.\n피가 철철나고 있잖아.
30040016.English_Text:
I'm more worried about you than my worries.
You're bleeding all over.
30040016.Chinese_Text:
我比我更担心你.
你一直在流血.

30040020.English_Text: It's an honor to be with you <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</>!

30040021.English_Text:
How do I... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lord Moon</>?
There is a cliff in front.
30040021.Chinese_Text:
我怎么... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>文珠大人</>?
 前面有悬崖.

30040022.Original_Text: 음... 이정도 높이면 가능할 수도 있겠는데?\n다들 괜찮겠지?
30040022.English_Text:
Um... I think it might be possible to raise it this much?
Is everyone going to be okay?
30040022.Chinese_Text:
嗯……能不能涨这么多?
大家没事吧?

30040023.Original_Text: 저, 저 녀석이!! 언제쯤 철이 들는지.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>께 도움 되지는 못할망정...!
30040023.English_Text:
Hey, that guy!! When will he grow old.
I don't think it will be of any help to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lord Moon</>...!
30040023.Chinese_Text:
我,那个家伙!!什么时候才能成熟. 
 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 月亮大师</> 忍不住……!

30040025.Original_Text: 그, 그러게요. 잠시 시간을 두고 오실까요?
30040025.English_Text: Yeah, that's right. Would you like to leave some time?
30040025.Chinese_Text: 他会的你想离开一段时间吗?

30040026.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>시국 사형</>은 왜 그렇게 삐뚤어져 버린 걸 까?\n어렸을 때는 정말 착했는데...
30040026.English_Text:
Why was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The death penalty</> turned so crooked?
I was really nice when I was younger...
30040026.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>为什么死刑</>这么歪?
我小时候真的很善良……

30040027.Original_Text: 아니 저 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>낡은 삭도</>를 타고 가다니 제정신인가?\n어휴... 사람이 어쩌다 그렇게 된 건지...
30040027.English_Text:
No, are you crazy to ride that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>old razor</>?
Uhhh... how did people become like that...
30040027.Chinese_Text: 不,你骑那把<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>旧剃须刀</>是理智的吗?
